replies.body:
The bar should have dodged.

Case closed.
We're not in Season 1 {{champion:32}}
{{champion:83}} (walks in, sees the counter gone) ...what the hell? Riot told me they fixed this problem!
{{champion:78}} I see you want to win lane. Well, let's duke it out for 4 years until my jungler comes.

Yasuo is an alcoholic so bars are no match. 

Ez game.
Nope.  If there was ever a champ that had counters, it's yasou.  What he lacks is counterplay, if you're playing anyone other than his counters.

> [{quoted}](name=6Sfool,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5L7wgMxi,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-21T19:06:50.365+0000)
>
> Nope.  If there was ever a champ that had counters, it's yasou.  What he lacks is counterplay, if you're playing anyone other than his counters.

Have you recently talked about Yasuo on another thread? I remember someone writing it as "yasou" and it bugged the hell outta me

Woah.  I never noticed the u was before the o.
Wow that took me a while.  I'll probably still keep spelling it that way out of habit.
Whenever you spell his name, just sing it to the tune of "Let it Go" if you reverse the order of the letters it will not work... ever.
idk a lot of people spell it Yasou. Doesn't make it right, but just saying it's common.
I've never seen it before now, but I may have just not noticed.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5L7wgMxi,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2016-11-22T00:35:58.396+0000)
>
> idk a lot of people spell it Yasou. Doesn't make it right, but just saying it's common.

>
> Nope.  If there was ever a champ that had counters, it's yasou.  What he lacks is counterplay, if you're playing anyone other than his counters.

Yasuo is hard countered by 90% of the champs in the game and is one of the few champions that actually have room to outplay, unlike Darius and Tryndamere where they right click you to death.

My new OTP:

more like Alistar knocked up the bar with W > Q, Yasuo ulted it, and the counter vaporized (unless Yasuo can ult off of just Alistar W, i forget. either way, Alistar knocked it up with a targeted ability)

... the bar asks for barlings support.

QSS the knockup so he can't ult you. You'll still be knocked up but you'll no longer count as airborne.

mfw someone tells a joke, comments are filled with angry people defending yasuo
